body:
Hi 

Do you know what the meaning of this error is?

what should I do to solve this problem?

( I have a room with a window on the south side and I was analyzing the illuminance)
topic: Error in honeybee during illuminance analysis

replies.body:
Hi Tim,

This is a warning about non-palanar surfaces and happens when you have a non-planar surface which has quad non-planar mesh surfaces even after meshing. If the number of errors are not so many you can disregard it. What is the tolerance value in your model?

You may want to mesh the geometry beforehand and use msh2RAD component as an alternate workflow. Check this discussion: [http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/add-shading...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/group/ladybug/forum/topics/add-shading-context-honeybee?commentId=2985220%3AComment%3A1366942&groupId=2985220%3AGroup%3A658987)
